Comments_List: In this class, I learned so much about making documentary films. I learned that there are many ways and styles to make a film and I learned how to edit using Premiere. I also learned how to improve story flow.
The ability to set up three point lighting, use DSLR cameras to film and a brief introduction to Adobe Premier.
This class is excellent and Professor Musser is a great teacher. I really enjoyed the workshop style and the Tuesday night showings.
Strengths include the students who are in this class and the equipment we have access to. Weaknesses include the lack of structure, including very little professional expertise.

If you are interested in shooting and editing a documentary film, this is a great class, even if it is your first time making a film. Professor Musser (Charlie) is very helpful in making the films and he is also very encouraging. A lot of the work is self-driven so it is important to pace yourself.
No, unless you have a lot filmmaking experience and incredibly self-motivated.
